sides.title: Kraken
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 3 friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1 calculate token.

sides.title: TV-94
sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack against a defender in its [Bullseye Arc], if there are 2 or fewer attack dice, it may spend 1 calculate token to add 1 [Hit] result.
